title: Japanese giant SquareEnix to launch NFT auction for new Web3 game built on Ethereum, Polygon
contentSnippet:
Square Enix, the renowned publisher behind the “Final Fantasy” series, is set to initiate an NFT auction for its latest project, “Symbiogenesis,” in the coming week, according to a social media announcement. Symbiogenesis is built on the Ethereum and Polygon blockchain networks. It marks the company’s first foray into the Web3 gaming ecosystem. NFT Auction […]
The post Japanese giant SquareEnix to launch NFT auction for new Web3 game built on Ethereum, Polygon appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Hoskinson criticizes Vitalik for not acknowledging Cardano’s staking innovations
contentSnippet:
Cardano founder and Ethereum co-creator Charles Hoskinson criticized Vitalik Buterin in a tweet on Nov. 25 for not acknowledging Cardano (ADA) for its innovations in staking. Hoskinson’s remarks followed a recent interview, where Buterin discussed the Ethereum roadmap and proposed redesigning Ethereum’s (ETH) staking system to combat issues around centralization. During the interview, Buterin went […]
The post Hoskinson criticizes Vitalik for not acknowledging Cardano’s staking innovations appeared first on CryptoSlate.
